sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Long-Term Care Partnership Program Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Long-Term Care Partnership Program Act.

sections.heading: Findings. The General Assembly finds that our nation's current financing structure relies too heavily on individuals and families to bear the financial burden of long-term supportive services

sections.heading: The Partnership for Long-Term Care Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Partnership for Long-Term Care Act is repealed.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
